column3:
ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8461/commits/205eb350fd312ee0cf8dde9b0db0418799d2fbd9

As you are touching the helptext, can you please align "errors" and "chain" helptexts by adding two spaces before "(string)"?

```
  "errors": "..."          (string) Current errors
  "networkhashps": nnn,      (numeric) The network hashes per second
  "pooledtx": n              (numeric) The
ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8461/commits/205eb350fd312ee0cf8dde9b0db0418799d2fbd9 agree with @paveljanik about the PR related nits.\n
Updated to align "chain" and "errors" output with rest of help text.\n
Backport needed, I guess. (all the way back to 0.9.x, but we don't maintain that far back)\n

@luke-jr According to current https://bitcoincore.org/en/lifecycle/ 0.11 only receives critical security fixes and this is only a documentation fix. (Though, I am not against backports for 0.12 and 0.13)\n
